artefact.will_continue_on: the Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC) website
artefact.licence_short_description: Register as an orthoptist with the Health and Care Professions Council
artefact.licence_overview:
To practise as an orthoptist, you need to register with the [Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC).](http://www.hpc-uk.org/ "Health and Care Professions Council"){:rel="external"}

*[HCPC]: Health and Care Professions Council
